1145480.name: Avis: Lost Souls
1145480.description:
The oldest and strongest emotion of mankind is fear, and the oldest and strongest kind of fear is fear of the unknown.
H.P. Lovecraft

Build


Find Blueprints learn how to build in the Prisons.

Craft


Find Resources to build Tools and equipment to survive in the Prisons.

Survive


Eat food and boil water to keep your needs up.

Sanity


Keep your sanity up by having fun, listening to the Jukebox or take a chance at turning on the radio in the Prison, or putting on some Clothes and getting somewhere safe, and doing things to relax.


Heavily inspired by: Lovecraft, Ark: SE, Atlas, and Conan Exiles.
